checkout-deals: Welcome at de gouden draak. Click on this text to see our deals!
title: De Gouden Draak
subtitle: Chinese Indonesian Specialties
introduction: De Gouden Draak has been a household name for years when it comes to the best takeaway dishes in 's-Hertogenbosch. We would like to treat you to authentic dishes from Cantonese cuisine.
news: Due to the Corona crisis, De Gouden Draak is currently only open to a limited extent. The restaurant area is closed. You can still pick up your favorite dishes.
